name: Multiplayer Testing Grounds
description:
Thanks BaronTheCat for some of the UI art. (sorry for forgetting lol)

A remake of the original game I made on Pocket code back in 2021, made in the Unity game engine.

Multiplayer Testing Grounds is an online multiplayer game where you hang out with people and have a chat with them.

It's best experienced with a good connection, but there's lots of factors that can affect how fast you're connected to the servers

There's no WebGL build right now because I get errors when I build it, no matter the export settings. If you can help out with this, I will be very happy.
